content: this crochet pattern will instruct you to how to make the mama and baby turtle memory game the baby turtles have different colored circles on there tummy and when flipped kids will match the colors together when the baby turtles are not being played with they can be put in the mama for storage and played with as a stuffed toy this is for pattern only not a finished product materials 3 75 mm 4 25 mm 4 mm & 5 mm hook worsted weight yarn i used red heart super saver in black brown light green dark green and 9 different colors for memory turtles i used scraps of yarn i had laying around yarn needle for sewing poly-fil scissors 2 buttons sewing needle and thread black puff paint optional safety eyes optional the skills required to complete this pattern include basic crochet stitches crocheting in rounds changing colors sewing pieces together this pattern is written in english and uses u s crochet terminology this pattern is 12 pages long and includes instructions and multiple pictures by me and my testers and you can always contact me if you have any further questions the pattern is in pdf form pattern has been tested by multiple testers the finished product when using recommended yarn and hooks the mama turtle comes out about 15 inches long 14 inches wide babies are about 3 1/2-4 inches long size may vary depending on gauge please make sure all items are secure before giving to young children and put up when not in use this is for pattern only not a finished product
